proposal: Diving into the world of Emma Token, where evolution isn't just a word but a journey with your 127 ETH network comrades. 🌍 From the seamless blend of DEX's best features to the innovative companionship of Emma AI, it's clear you're not just tokenizing assets; you're crafting the future. Fancy making that future even brighter? Our toolkit can help expand the Wednesday Ecosystem further, from enhancing your DEX with our UNI FACTORY to adding a sprinkle of fun with our blockchain-based lottery. Let's grow together, without the need for a time machine or a Wednesday-only schedule.
